== Fields

=== `content`

The content of the message being inserted.
This field supports xref:configuration:interpolation.adoc#bloblang-queries[interpolation functions].

*Type*: `string`

*Default*: `""`

=== `index`

The index within the batch to insert the message at.

*Type*: `int`

*Default*: `-1`
